generated_doNotEdit.title: Charge Attack Behavior
generated_doNotEdit.description: Allows this entity to damage a target by using a running attack.

fields.title: Max Distance
fields.description: A charge attack cannot start if the entity is farther than this distance to the target.

fields.title: Min Distance
fields.description: A charge attack cannot start if the entity is closer than this distance to the target.

fields.title: Speed Multiplier
fields.description: Modifies the entity's speed when charging toward the target.

fields.title: Success Rate
fields.description: Percent chance this entity will start a charge attack, if not already attacking (1.0 = 100%)

fields.title: Priority
fields.description: As priority approaches 0, the priority is increased. The higher the priority, the sooner this behavior will be executed as a goal.
